---
title: "Gh_variables"
output: html_document
---
```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
gh <- gh %>% select(country, year, `Social support`, Generosity, `Healthy life expectancy at birth`, `Freedom to make life choices`, `Perceptions of corruption`, `Confidence in national government`, `Democratic Quality`, `Delivery Quality`) %>%
  filter(year == 2016)

whr <- gh2017 %>% select(Country, Dystopia.Residual) %>% mutate(country = Country)

final_whr <- left_join(gh, whr, "country")

write.csv(final_whr, file = "final_whr.csv")
```
